thread.title: Ryan M.S.
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Ryan M.S.

author: Ryan M.S.
title: Ryan M.S.
text: Only gripe I had which isn't huge is I wish I had more info on the packaging of the used item I bought, i.e. "repackaged in original packaging" as well as if there was pictures of the used item and all it comes with. I have never bought from B&H and I am concerned because the item is used I may not get EVERYTHING the original item came with. Other than that the actual process of buying the product was straight foreword.
